item.title: Abandoned flat bed truck, 26th July
item.description:
A flat bed truck has been abandoned in the road, with the number plate K100 HOO, which doesn’t seem to correspond with the vehicles The car on top of the truck is PF64 OJU. Which is untaxed and has no MOT. Please can this be looked into. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Rosecroft Close, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Christchurch Avenue, near Mowbray Road, 26th July
item.description:

item.title: Squashed fruit littering pavement, 26th July
item.description:
Squashed fruit fallen from tree is smelly & attracting lots of flies. Also a slip hazard as it’s rotting & it squashed in the pavement. Also lots of literally and rotten rubbish bags near this area. A street sweeper doesn’t clean the pavements

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London
